title: Chinese father Guo Gangtang finds his kidnapped son, 24 years and 300000 miles later
content:
1. Chinese father Guo Gangtang finds his kidnapped son, 24 years and 300000 miles later  The Washington Post
  2. This family's 24-year search for their abducted son inspired a movie. They've just been reunited  CNN
  3. Dad Who Never Gave Up Hope Finds Abducted Son After 24 Years  The Daily Beast
  4. Father reunited with son snatched as baby 24 years ago in China - BBC News  BBC News
  5. Parents Who Never Stopped Searching Reunite With Son Abducted 24 Years Ago  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 誘拐された息子を24年後、30万マイル後に発見した中国の父親Guo Gangtang氏。
中国父亲郭刚堂在24年后的30万英里外找到了他被绑架的儿子
中國父親郭剛堂在24年後的30萬英里外找到了他被綁架的兒子
